snippet: The best and most surprising responses I have received are from several readers who start by telling me that they don't have a weight problem, but they now have a better understanding of the challenges overweight people face.
abstract: The best and most surprising responses I have received are from several readers who start by telling me that they don't have a weight problem, but they now have a better understanding of the challenges overweight people face.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Tara Parker-Pope on Weight Loss
